lexUnit.name: anger.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility.

sentence.text: They have also aroused Protestant anger against Dr Runcie , at the same time as he has become involved in a row over his attack on the ` Pharisees " of British society .
